description: Starts replication for a Source Network. This action would make the Source Network protected.

parameters.name: sourceNetworkID
parameters.description: ID of the Source Network to replicate.

nested_items.name: sourceNetwork
nested_items.description: Source Network which was requested for replication.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Source Network.

nested_items.name: cfnStackName
nested_items.description: CloudFormation stack name that was deployed for recovering the Source Network.

nested_items.name: lastRecovery
nested_items.description: An object containing information regarding the last recovery of the Source Network.

nested_items.name: apiCallDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the last Source Network recovery was initiated.

nested_items.name: jobID
nested_items.description: The ID of the Job that was used to last recover the Source Network.

nested_items.name: lastRecoveryResult
nested_items.description: The status of the last recovery status of this Source Network.

nested_items.name: launchedVpcID
nested_items.description: ID of the recovered VPC following Source Network recovery.

nested_items.name: replicationStatus
nested_items.description: Status of Source Network Replication. Possible values: (a) STOPPED - Source Network is not replicating. (b) IN_PROGRESS - Source Network is being replicated. (c) PROTECTED - Source Network was replicated successfully and is being synchronized for changes. (d) ERROR - Source Network replication has failed.

nested_items.name: replicationStatusDetails
nested_items.description: Error details in case Source Network replication status is ERROR.

nested_items.name: sourceAccountID
nested_items.description: Account ID containing the VPC protected by the Source Network.

nested_items.name: sourceRegion
nested_items.description: Region containing the VPC protected by the Source Network.

nested_items.name: sourceVpcID
nested_items.description: VPC ID protected by the Source Network.
